biotools.summary: MyCLADE is an accurate multi-source domain annotation server designed for a fast exploration of genomic and metagenomic sets of sequences. MyCLADE performs a multi-source domain annotation strategy based on a library of probabilistic domain models associated to each domain.

bioschemas.name: MyCLADE
bioschemas.summary: MyCLADE is an accurate multi-source domain annotation server designed for a fast exploration of genomic and metagenomic sets of sequences. MyCLADE performs a multi-source domain annotation strategy based on a library of probabilistic domain models associated to each domain.
